snippet: African heads of state on Wednesday refused to recognize the rebel leader Michel Djotodia’s self-appointment as president of Central African Republic.
abstract: African heads of state refuse to recognize rebel leader Michel Djotodia's self-appointment as president of Central African Republic, calling instead for creation of new transitional body to guide country to elections.
lead_paragraph: African heads of state on Wednesday refused to recognize the rebel leader Michel Djotodia’s self-appointment as president of Central African Republic.

headline.seo: Regional Leaders Refuse to Recognize Rebel Head in Central African Republic
headline.main: Regional Leaders Refuse to Recognize Rebel Head in Central African Republic
headline.print_headline: Regional Leaders Refuse to Recognize Rebel Head in Central African Republic
